page.title: 05CHALFONT LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
Beaconsfield{Golf}Club is a private club with 600 members.It is set in 50 acres and is an 18 hole course.The clubhouse is very spacious including a shop and offices.
Outfield{Stables} is sponsored by Karina Equestrian Co.Ltd.It has 6 fields covering 8 acres and stables for 10 horses all year.The horses are groomed for half an hour every day, they are then exercised for an hour and after that they spend two to three hours in the fields.They are fed on bran, pony nuts sugar beet, hay and oats twice a day. Every 4-6 weeks they have their shoes replaced. A blacksmith and a vet call at the stables when they are needed. The Stable Manager and Owner train the eventers.
